data.bulk-invite-success-email-activation-not:
Hey {userFullName},

You are invited to join {organizationTitle}. This app makes our workspace even more comfortable. Here you can book meeting rooms, apply for services and benefits, contact support, and communicate with the community. Now you have a full control of important workflows.

To get started, activate account with your email {userEmail}.
If you have any questions, feel free to contact the branch manager. Enjoy!
data.bulk-invite-success-email-subject: You are invited to join {organizationTitle} app
data.email-confirmation-text: Use it to access your account within 5 minutes.
data.email-confirmation-title: Just checking to be sure you're you
data.email-confirmation-warning: If you didn't sign up for an account, please ignore this email.
data.invoice-finalize-notification-body: {teamTitle} invoice for {invoiceMonth} is ready! View and pay right away.
data.membership-plan-ends-in-five-days-notifi: Your membership plan ends in 5 days. Buy a new plan to stay.
data.membership-plan-ends-tomorrow-notificati: Your membership plan ends tomorrow. Buy a new plan to stay.
data.membership-plan-renew-in-five-days-notif: Your membership plan will be automatically extended in 5 days.
data.membership-plan-renew-tomorrow-notificat: Your membership plan will be automatically extended tomorrow.
data.organization-request-to-join-notice: This is an automated message. Please do not reply.
